overviewDetails.question: What Is Online MCA Course?
answer: An Online MCA (Master of Computer Applications) degree is a digital version of the traditional MCA program. It is designed for students and working professionals interested in careers in IT, software development, cloud computing, data analytics, and cybersecurity. This online course provides comprehensive knowledge of programming, database management, software engineering, and advanced computer applications.

The Online MCA degree allows students to study remotely with flexible schedules. Key features include interactive Learning Management Systems (LMS), live and recorded lectures, coding labs, discussion forums, projects, and access to digital technical libraries. The program is ideal for graduates and professionals seeking to enhance skills in IT and computer applications without attending a physical campus.

answer: The Online Diploma in Business and Management (DBM) provides foundational knowledge in business administration, leadership, operations, marketing, and human resource management. It is suitable for students, working professionals, and career changers seeking opportunities in corporate, entrepreneurial, or management roles.

The program offers flexible online learning through an advanced LMS with live and recorded lectures, business case studies, management simulations, assignments, and hands-on project work. Learners gain practical exposure to tools and techniques used in management, making them job-ready without attending physical classes.

These projects help students apply management concepts to real business situations, develop analytical and leadership skills, and gain hands-on experience in decision-making.

overviewDetails.question: What Is Online CIoT Course?
answer: The Online Certificate Program in Internet of Things (CIoT) equips learners with practical skills in IoT device integration, sensor management, cloud connectivity, data analytics, and IoT application deployment. It is ideal for 12th pass students, graduates, working professionals, and career changers aiming to become proficient IoT developers.

The program offers flexible online learning through an advanced LMS with live and recorded lectures, IoT lab exercises, project work, and mentorship sessions. Learners gain hands-on experience in microcontrollers, Raspberry Pi/Arduino, cloud platforms, real-time data processing, and real-world IoT applications, making them career-ready without attending physical classes.

overviewDetails.question: What Is Distance DLISc Course?

desc: The Distance Diploma in Library and Information Sciences (DLISc) includes practical assignments, cataloguing and classification exercises, digital library activities, and project-based learning focused on library operations, information organization, and documentation processes.

These projects help students apply library science concepts to real-world situations, develop technical skills, and gain practical exposure relevant to library and information service roles.
